mapper.select: SELECT a.homeId_zch_hwz_gjc, COUNT(c.hFavoriteRecordsId_zch_hwz_gjc) AS collectionCount FROM tab_home_zch_hwz_gjc a LEFT JOIN tab_housecollection_zch_hwz_gjc c ON a.homeId_zch_hwz_gjc = c.homeId_zch_hwz_gjc GROUP BY a.homeId_zch_hwz_gjc ORDER BY collectionCount DESC limit 10

SELECT h.* FROM tab_Home_zch_hwz_gjc h JOIN tab_order_zch_hwz_gjc o ON h.homeId_zch_hwz_gjc = o.homeId_zch_hwz_gjc JOIN tab_homeInformation_zch_hwz_gjc i ON h.homeId_zch_hwz_gjc = i.homeId_zch_hwz_gjc WHERE (#{endDate} < o.creationTime_zch_hwz_gjc OR #{beginDate} > o.endTime_zch_hwz_gjc OR o.creationTime_zch_hwz_gjc IS NULL) AND h.homeAddress_zch_hwz_gjc LIKE CONCAT('%', #{address}, '%') AND h.homeDayRent_zch_hwz_gjc BETWEEN #{minRent} AND #{maxRent} AND i.maxPerson_zch_hwz_gjc >= #{maxPeople} AND h.homeType_zch_hwz_gjc LIKE CONCAT('%', #{homeType}, '%') LIMIT #{page}, #{size}
